document_data.name: Kralgar Bonesnapper
document_data.mainbody: '''Kralgar Bonesnapper''' was the chieftain of the [[Uthgardt]] [[Griffon tribe]] who ruled [[Griffon's Nest]] during the midâ€”14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Kralgar put little faith in the power of [[magic]].
document_data.Activities:
He endlessly struggled to fulfill his goal of conquering and ruling one of the great cities of [[the North]].

Kralgar wanted most to be enthroned in [[Silverymoon]], and would almost be content with [[Everlund]], if the city were more significant and defensable. He would likely settle for [[Neverwinter]], [[Mirabar]], [[Sundabar]] or [[Everlund]].
document_data.Possessions: Despite his beliefs, Kralgar acquired quite a number of [[magical item]]s in his quest for power.
